mapper.insert: insert into cart (cart_id, userid, product_id, amount) values (seq_cart.nextval,#{userid},#{product_id},#{amount})
mapper.select: select cart_id, p.product_id, c.userid, name, product_name, amount, price, (price*amount) money from member m, cart c, product p where m.userid=c.userid and c.product_id=p.product_id and c.userid=#{userid} order by cart_id
mapper.update: update cart set amount=#{amount} where cart_id=#{cart_id}
